DEATHKNIGHT_FROST: Use Power Infusion while Pillar of Frost is up, as well as Breath of Sindragosa or on cooldown if Pillar of Frost and Breath of Sindragosa are not talented
DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY: Use Power Infusion while Gargoyle is up, as well as Apocalypse or with Dark Transformation if Apocalypse or Gargoyle are not talented
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the Havoc Demon Hunter when:

  • They have Metamorphosis active
  • The fight will end within 20 seconds
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • They activate Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune to maximize their burst damage phase.
  • They are in a high-uptime phase of their rotation, ensuring maximum benefit from increased haste for Starfire and Starsurge casts.
  • Their Warrior of Elune talent is active, enabling rapid spellcasting during the empowered window.
EVOKER_DEVASTATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Devastation Evoker when:

  • The Evoker has Dragonrage active and either Shattering Star is on cooldown, the Shattering Star debuff is present on the target, or there are 2 or more enemies.
  • The encounter will end within 35 seconds.
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:

  • Their Trueshot buff has more than 12 seconds remaining (to amplify the burst window)
  • The encounter will end in less than 13 seconds (to prevent cooldown waste)
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • They have Coordinated Assault active, to amplify its damage window.
  • They do not have the Coordinated Assault talent, and Spearhead is on cooldown.
  • They have neither Coordinated Assault nor Spearhead talents, allowing flexible use on cooldown.
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the Arcane Mage when:

  • The Mage does not have Spymaster's Web equipped and they just cast Arcane Surge.
  • The Mage has Spymaster's Web equipped and they just cast Evocation.
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the Fire Mage when:

  • Combustion is about to come off cooldown (within their pre-cast preparation window).
  • Combustion is already active and has more than 7 seconds remaining on its duration.
  • The encounter will end in less than 20 seconds to ensure the full benefit is utilized.
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Death Knight when:

  • They activate Icy Veins to amplify their burst damage window.
  • They cast Rune of Power to maximize spell damage during their cooldown phase.
  • They prepare to unleash a Glacial Spike or Comet Storm for critical burst potential.
  • They enter a Freezing Winds proc window to enhance Frostbolt and Flurry damage.
MONK_WINDWALKER: Use Power Infusion while Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger is active.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • They activate Avenging Wrath for a burst damage window.
  • They activate Crusade to amplify their stacking haste and damage buff.
  • Their target is affected by Execution Sentence to maximize the debuff's damage amplification.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Assassination Rogue when:

  • The target has an active Deathmark effect applied (during their primary damage window).
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the Subtlety Rogue when:

  • Their Shadow Dance is active, as this aligns with their burst damage window.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Elemental Shaman when:

  • When the Shaman is under the effect of Ascendance.
  • When the Shaman's Ascendance cooldown has more than 30 seconds remaining.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when:

  • the Enhancement Shaman has Ascendance active
  • the Enhancement Shaman has Feral Spirit active
  • the Enhancement Shaman has Doom Winds active
  • the encounter will end within 20 seconds of the next 2-minute interval
  • the Shaman's major cooldowns are all on cooldown for at least 120 seconds
  • the Shaman does not have Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds talented
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when:

  • They are actively using major cooldowns such as Dark Soul: Misery or Summon Darkglare to amplify their burst damage window.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the Demonology Warlock when:

  • Their Demonic Tyrant is about to be summoned within 2 global cooldowns + cast time of the ability.
  • They have just cast Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination to maximize demon uptime.
  • Their Imps are close to despawning (within 1 global cooldown + Demonic Tyrant cast time) OR they have fewer than 2 Soul Shards to sustain summoning.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Destruction Warlock when:

  • Their Summon Infernal is active to amplify its burst window.
  • They did not select the Summon Infernal talent, making cooldown alignment unnecessary.
  • The fight will end before they can cast another Summon Infernal and you can’t delay until their next burst phase.
  • The remaining fight duration is less than 15 seconds beyond Summon Infernal’s cooldown, forcing immediate usage.
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the Arms Warrior when:

  • The target is affected by Colossus Smash and the encounter has at least 135 seconds remaining.
  • The warrior is in Execute phase (target below 20% health) with Avatar active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior when:

  • Avatar has more than 15 seconds remaining and the encounter will last at least 135 seconds.
  • In Execute phase (target below 20% health) while Avatar is active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds, regardless of other cooldowns.
